portfolio.title: Personal website
portfolio.description: Personal CV website and my project for learning front-end development with React. This project uses React-Bootstrap library. Hosted on GitHub Pages.

questions.experience: What kind of hands-on experience do you have?
questions.interests: Interests within the field of computer science?

answers.paragraph-who: A 3rd year CS bachelor's student who enjoys working with people and is always ready to learn new skills.
answers.paragraph-skills: I have hands-on experience with software development through my university’s project course, where we are developing an app for Android based AR-glasses. I have also gained experience with frontend-development from making this website.
answers.paragraph-interests: In addition to software delopment I am particuarly interested in machine learning, which is something I potentially want to pursue in my master's, and computer graphics.
answers.paragraph-others: Outside of school and work you can find me hanging out with horses or painting. I also enjoy playing piano and football.
answers.paragraph-random: My last name 'Ma' means horse in Chinese and I am very happy of that.
